$interpreted: Edward: I've been following that thief ever since she left the casino and I've finally got her to steal me this necklace.
Edward: With this necklace, I'll have access to all of the Aldric's valuables in the treasury.
Edward: Or perhaps I sell it on the black market? It would certainly bring me a nice, fat stack.
Joan: Hold it right there!
Edward: Jo-Jo! What is it? Why must you treat me so?
Joan: Oh, shut it with that Jo-Jo crap! I'm the infamous Thief of the Gleaming Star!
Joan: It is I who steals! Whoever dares steal from me had best beware!
Puggi: Where do you think you're going!
Edward: Damn! Flanked!
Joan: Master! Get him!
Puggi: Don't even think about it, bucko...
Puggi: I will not permit an unmarried couple to be sneaking out in the middle of the night and meeting up! Absolutely unacceptable!
Puggi: I've never had a date in the middle of the night, so what makes you think you can go running around like this?
Edward: Ah!?
Puggi: Joan, my lovely lady, this is much too dangerous. Look how late it is. What if something happens to you?
Joan: Master, love is too tiring. I never want to fall in love again~
Puggi: Wonderful~you can be with me for the rest of your life~~
Joan: Hmm...be with me...always...where have I heard that before...?
Puggi: Ouch...
Joan: Ah! Now I remember! That's what that noble was muttering in his sleep.
Joan: Master, as an upstanding thief, there's something I must do!
Puggi: What is it?
Joan: I must return this necklace!
Ace: Even though you've come to your senses, you are still an enemy of the Kingdom of the Sun.
Joan: You're awake! That sleeping gas should've put you out for the entire day...
Ace: It's not that I awoke, I never was sleeping in the first place.
Joan: You were awake the whole time!
Joan: Then why'd you let me take the necklace?
Ace: There's an old proverb. "Men do not despise a thief, if he steal to satisfy his soul when he is hungry."
Ace: I wanted to see who had the gall to steal from the Aldric family.
Joan: I am so sorry. I stole your family's valuables without even making things clear.
Ace: Actually, the necklace is not what is important. What is of value...is this box.
Joan: Why is that, may I ask?
Ace: When my sister was seven...she made this box just for me. It's more valuable than all the jewels in this world! But...
Ace: This scumbag dared cast it aside like a piece of trash! My sister...she's the most adorable person in the world! Such disrespect!!!
Ace: Bring him back!
Ace: As for you...I overheard your conversation.
Ace: It seems you were deceived as well. I hope that next time...you meet a better man.
Puggi: My lady, Joan! What happened? Were you almost taken away? You're fine, that's all that matters~
Joan: Master, I think...
Joan: ...that man let me go on purpose. Could it be...that he likes me!?
Puggi: EHHHHH!?!?!?!?!?
Joan: So many men have fallen...Alas! What kind of woman am I?

Model.Text: I've been following that thief ever since she left the casino and I've finally got her to steal me this necklace.
With this necklace, I'll have access to all of the Aldric's valuables in the treasury.
Or perhaps I sell it on the black market? It would certainly bring me a nice, fat stack.
Hold it right there!
Jo-Jo! What is it? Why must you treat me so?
Oh, shut it with that Jo-Jo crap! I'm the infamous Thief of the Gleaming Star!
It is I who steals! Whoever dares steal from me had best beware!
Where do you think you're going!
Damn! Flanked!
Master! Get him!
Don't even think about it, bucko...
I will not permit an unmarried couple to be sneaking out in the middle of the night and meeting up! Absolutely unacceptable!
I've never had a date in the middle of the night, so what makes you think you can go running around like this?
Ah!?
Joan, my lovely lady, this is much too dangerous. Look how late it is. What if something happens to you?
Master, love is too tiring. I never want to fall in love again~
Wonderful~you can be with me for the rest of your life~~
Hmm...be with me...always...where have I heard that before...?
Ouch...
Ah! Now I remember! That's what that noble was muttering in his sleep.
Master, as an upstanding thief, there's something I must do!
What is it?
I must return this necklace!
Even though you've come to your senses, you are still an enemy of the Kingdom of the Sun.
You're awake! That sleeping gas should've put you out for the entire day...
It's not that I awoke, I never was sleeping in the first place.
You were awake the whole time!
Then why'd you let me take the necklace?
There's an old proverb. "Men do not despise a thief, if he steal to satisfy his soul when he is hungry."
I wanted to see who had the gall to steal from the Aldric family.
I am so sorry. I stole your family's valuables without even making things clear.
Actually, the necklace is not what is important. What is of value...is this box.
Why is that, may I ask?
When my sister was seven...she made this box just for me. It's more valuable than all the jewels in this world! But...
This scumbag dared cast it aside like a piece of trash! My sister...she's the most adorable person in the world! Such disrespect!!!
Bring him back!
As for you...I overheard your conversation.
It seems you were deceived as well. I hope that next time...you meet a better man.
My lady, Joan! What happened? Were you almost taken away? You're fine, that's all that matters~
Master, I think...
...that man let me go on purpose. Could it be...that he likes me!?
So many men have fallen...Alas! What kind of woman am I?
